title: Mobile-Based Self-Regulated Second Language Acquisition Intensive Short-Term Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic second-language vocabulary and understanding of grammatical structures
context.additional_context: Creating self-directed learning environments enabled by learning analytics in smartphone-centric limited technology settings

learning_goals: Learners perform self-directed target language listening training in 20-minute sessions at least five times per week via a mobile app.
Learners establish and implement individualized vocabulary learning plans based on learning analytics reports with over 80% adherence.
Learners can perform basic communication (greetings, questions, explanations) in the target language through context-specific conversation simulations in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
